title: Rechargeable Portable Mini Juicer Blender ? 6 Blades, 380ml Outdoor Juicing Cup [Random Color]
description:
Portable USB Chargeable Juicer Blender
Effortless Juicing Anywhere, Anytime!Experience the convenience of fresh, nutritious juices on the go with our Portable USB Chargeable Juicer Blender. This compact cup doubles as a smoothie maker, offering unmatched versatility for your active lifestyle.Powerful Performance, Quick ResultsWith its 6 stainless steel blades and super-strong motor, this blender effortlessly transforms fruits and vegetables into smooth, delicious smoothies in just 30 seconds. Whether you?re at home, in the office, or on the road, enjoy your favorite drinks with ease.Easy Operation and CleaningOperating this juicer blender is a breeze ? simply press the ?ON? button twice to start juicing. Cleaning is equally effortless, with a self-cleaning function activated by adding water and pressing the button. Please note: avoid submerging the motor base in water or using dishwashers for cleaning.Working time:Can use 6-8 times after full charge(Note: it may less depends on how you runs it)Capacity:380ml

Rechargeable
